### Welcome to L!Tabs. Light Weigh Tabs for geeks, Deprecated script from 2014, bring to live. Before jQuery Tabs, We had L!Tabs, a small script that will allow you to create beautiful already coded tabs. Download the `src` and included to your project and let the code take the heacy lifting. Easy modification for your own benefits. ### Templates Included Weâ€™ve two templates included with this script, classic view, and a modern blue skin view, depending on your taste.
